meanings.definition: A gimmick or trick used to attract attention or create humor.
meanings.sent1: The clown's red nose was his favorite shtiks during the show.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's shtiks always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent3: The magician's disappearing act shtiks never failed to amuse the children.
meanings.sent4: Her shtiks of juggling knives symbolized her daring personality.
meanings.sent5: The shtiks of the jester were so entertaining that everyone remembered them.

meanings.definition: A characteristic trait or mannerism that is unique to a person or group.
meanings.sent1: His habit of tapping his foot was one of his shtiks.
meanings.sent2: The team's victory dance became their signature shtiks.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa's shtiks of telling long stories always put us to sleep.
meanings.sent4: Her shtiks of always wearing mismatched socks made her stand out.
meanings.sent5: The cat's shtiks of knocking things off the table annoyed everyone.
